turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about A. C. N. Nambiar.
turn.1: What was the Legion in Europe during World War II?
turn.2: The 9th Company was sent to Italy, where some Legion personnel were already being used in intelligence and propaganda roles.
turn.3: What intelligence gathering techniques were used?
turn.4: The experiment was a complete failure.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: They were positioned opposite a Polish force.
turn.7: Did they have any problems when facing off against the Polish force?
turn.8: The initial reconnaissance party immediately deserted, followed by the entire company refusing to go into action on the grounds that the Poles were not their enemy.
turn.9: Did they face any other troubles?
turn.10: Nambiar was imprisoned after the war for collaboration with the enemy.
turn.12: He escaped to Switzerland and, against the wishes of Britain, was given an Indian passport by Nehru's Interim Government.
